desc.p: Indicated whether the statement entries are to be masked or not.
Mandatory Input.
YES Indicates that entries should be masked.
NO - Indicates that entries should be unmasked.
All statement entries ids that are to be matched.
All entries must exist on the STMT.ENTRY file.
If more than one entry is captured, then they must be all debits or all credits.
This is updated by the system. Its the total of all the statement entries in the MATCHED.TO field.
This is updated by the system. It is the total of all statement entries in the MATCHED.FROM field.
This is updated by the system. The net total between the TO.TOTAL and the FROM.TOTAL fields must be zero otherwise and error will be generated.
Descriptive field used to update statement entries.
Todays date Updated by the system.
All statement entry ids that are to be matched.
Statement entry id must exist on the STMT.ENTRY file.
If more than one entry is captured then they must be all debit or all credit entries.
The account number of the customer whos entries are to be masked.
Mandatory Input
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
The end date for the selection of statement entries to be masked.
Optional Input Default is todays system date.
This is the start date for the selection of statement entries to be masked.
Optional input Default is todays system date.
